item.title: My Doom Emacs Configuration
item.description: Figure 1: Emacs main window in iTerm2 Figure 2: Emacs quickshow window with Org agenda Intro Forewords A few words about my background. I’m a researcher in the field of educational science. I am no programmer, other than borrowing codes from stack overflow all the time. My experience with plain text editors started with writing monkey,and then Sublime Text. But Emacs quickly replaced almost every app in both my work and leisure workflow.
